channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-16922] Typo in serde.thrift: COLLECTION_DELIM = "colelction.delim"
item.description:
https://github.com/apache/hive/blob/master/serde/if/serde.thrift

Typo in serde.thrift:
COLLECTION_DELIM = "colelction.delim"

(colelction instead of collection)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
This patch file is created based on master branch.
The Thrift codes are generated by thrift-0.9.3.

libing, have you checked the latest test failures? Is any of them related to your patch?

lirui, I can't reproduce TestMiniLlapLocalCliDriver[vector_if_expr] in my env, I don't think it caused by this patch.
Hi libing, I guess we also need metastore upgrade scripts to update the values that are already stored in DB, so that users can continue use the data when they upgrade to the new hive version.
lirui Thank you for your comments. This property will be written in SERDE_PARAMS table when the user specifies it. I updated the patch as version #3.
